thread.title: Boko Haram atttack kills at least 15 in Nigeria

title: Boko Haram atttack kills at least 15 in Nigeria
text:
Boko Haram atttack kills at least 15 in Nigeria 12:58pm EDT - 01:05 
A Boko Haram attack in the Nigerian city of Maiduguri killed at least 15 people and wounded 83, a military spokesman said on Monday, in the biggest strike since the government said it was in talks with the Islamist militant group.   
A Boko Haram attack in the Nigerian city of Maiduguri killed at least 15 people and wounded 83, a military spokesman said on Monday, in the biggest strike since the government said it was in talks with the Islamist militant group.  //reut.rs/2q0nvw5
